channel.title: A couple testscape questions!
channel.description:
Ok I found a hoster for my server Twilight, and i'm about to bring it back, but before I publicly release it again I want to add some things.
First off, Where can I find a tutorial for ancient magicks to work? All the ancient magicks that work for me are the tellys that's it not the barrages or anything.. soo I need a tut for that please.
And, My Autospawn.cfg is messed up. Whenever I put enemies on it they don't appear in the map ( yes I compile before running server -.-' ) I add them but nope they're not there ( this just started happening today ) I even went back to my very first source and added some random npcs and went into the server they don't appear on there either. any ideas?
Also, my graphics alignment are horrible, when using a regular magic spell like fireblast, firebolt, firewave ext. the graphic of the spell appears far away not showing it on the enemy but the enemy still gets hit, so any idea on how to align my spells and other graphics would be great!
Once I solve these I can release my server.
Any help is greatly appreciated, thank you! :)

item.title: A couple testscape questions!
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

you might not used tab
you might not put right coords
you might done 1 height instead of 0

well, choise enoufgh.

item.title: A couple testscape questions!
item.dc:creator: @Lookaway Lookaway
item.description:
@Lookaway wrote:

Ok I found a hoster for my server Twilight, and i’m about to bring it back, but before I publicly release it again I want to add some things.

First off,
Where can I find a tutorial for ancient magicks to work? All the ancient magicks that work for me are the tellys that’s it not the barrages or anything… soo I need a tut for that please.

And,
My Autospawn.cfg is messed up. Whenever I put enemies on it they don’t appear in the map ( yes I compile before running server -.-’ ) I add them but nope they’re not there ( this just started happening today ) I even went back to my very first source and added some random npcs and went into the server they don’t appear on there either. any ideas?

Also,
my graphics alignment are horrible, when using a regular magic spell like fireblast, firebolt, firewave ext. the graphic of the spell appears far away not showing it on the enemy but the enemy still gets hit, so any idea on how to align my spells and other graphics would be great!

Once I solve these I can release my server.

Any help is greatly appreciated, thank you!
